docs.lead_paragraph: In recent weeks several hundred business executives around the country were surprised to find that they had been enrolled in a new book club. Each month, they discovered, a free book will be sent to them by a venture called the Weyerhaeuser Little Library Book Club.

headline.main: Advertising: Books Becoming Sales 'Tools'; Encyclopedia Distributed Cigarette Comments Resignation Accounts People

docs.abstract: article on use of books as ad medium; Weyerhaeuser Co Little Library Book Club cited; illus
